instructions: To setup your Fitbit Versa, start by downloading the Fitbit App for your smartphone. Download for iOS Download for Android Then, open the app and Tap Log-in or Create Account . If you already have a Fitbit account, you won t need to create a new one. If you re new to Fitbit, the app will walk you through the process of setting up an account. If you already have a Fitbit account, open the app and log in. Then tap the Account icon in the upper left corner, and tap + Set up a Device . Choose the device you re setting up. In this case, it will be the Versa or Versa 2 . Follow the onscreen instructions to complete the device setup.

Open the Fitbit App and tap your Account icon in the top left corner of the page. On the page that appears, tap the name of your device. Scroll down and tap Notifications . Make sure the toggle on the right side of the page is blue ( On ) to enable notifications for Calls , Text Messages , Calendar Events , Emails , and App Notifications . You can also toggle On the option for Voice Replies if you're using an Android phone and want to use voice-to-text to answer incoming text messages.
